verbs.description: another nasa space telescope shuts down in orbit another nasa space telescope [V: has] shut down and halted science observations less than a week after the hubble space telescope went offline the chandra x - ray observatory did the same thing nasa said friday that chandra automatically went into so - called safe mode wednesday possibly because of a gyroscope problem hubble went into hibernation last friday due to a gyroscope failure both orbiting observatories are old and in well - extended missions hubble is 28 while chandra is 19 flight controllers are working to resume operations with both hubble space telescope associated press health science department spitzer space telescope associated press health science department howard hughes medical institute department of science education howard hughes medical institutes department of science education fla jonathan mcdowell hubble chandra x - ray observatory cape canaveral chandra x ray observatory compton gamma ray observatory harvard - smithsonian center for astrophysics chandra harvard smithsonian center for astrophysics nasa
